mapper.update: update leave_history set start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_manager_id = #{approveManagerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_date = #{approveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, start_time, end_time, create_date, update_date, employee_id, approve_manager_id, approve_date, description from leave_history where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, start_time, end_time, create_date, update_date, employee_id, approve_manager_id, approve_date, description from leave_history
